entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
